A checklist to organize your launches in steps Easy overview of the entire launch process Ability to plan better launches Frequently Asked Questions What is Notion?Notion is a free-to-use single digital space where you can think, write, and plan. Capture thoughts, manage projects, or even run an entire company — and do it exactly the way you want. Who are you?I am Pascio, official Notion Ambassador, Consultant & Creator of more than 50+ free & premium Notion templates that have served 200,000+ people across the globe. Can I share this with anyone else?No. This product has a private license. If you wish to share the checklist with someone, please direct them to this page. Can I be your affiliate?Sure thing! You can sign up as an affiliate here. Can I ask you questions?Of course! I'm always open to chat and respond to DM's on any of my socials. I have a response rate of a few hours, so don't be afraid to contact me.Twitter / Reddit / InstagramOr email to: notionpascio@gmail.com P.S. If you're serious about launching products, I have a complete Notion system designed for this purpose as well as a detailed guide on how I've consistently hit top placements on Producthunt.
